TITLE: Setting Up the Development Environment DESCRIPTION: Series of commands to install dependencies, create and migrate databases, seed data, and set up frontend assets. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alternative Manual Setup Process DESCRIPTION: Step-by-step commands to set up the development environment manually instead of using the make install shortcut. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` mix deps.get mix ecto.create mix ecto.migrate mix run priv/repo/seeds.exs npm ci --prefix assets npm ci --prefix tracker mix assets.setup npm run deploy --prefix tracker mix download_country_database ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting the Phoenix Server DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Phoenix server for local development. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make server ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Postgres and Clickhouse Docker Containers DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the required database containers (Postgres and Clickhouse) for the development environment. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make postgres make clickhouse ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring ClickHouse Database URL in Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: Replacement of multiple ClickHouse configuration parameters with a single database URL parameter in Plausible Analytics. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: Environment Variables CODE: ``` CLICKHOUSE_DATABASE_URL= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Database Socket Authentication in Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: Environment variables added to enable local PostgreSQL authentication via socket for Plausible Analytics. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Environment Variables CODE: ``` DATABASE_SOCKET_DIR= DATABASE_NAME= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Pre-commit Hooks DESCRIPTION: Commands to install pre-commit hooks for code quality checks across Elixir, JavaScript, and CSS. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` pip install --user pre-commit pre-commit install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Alternative Phoenix Server Startup DESCRIPTION: Alternative command to start the Phoenix server using mix directly. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` mix phx.server ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Database Seeds Script DESCRIPTION: Command to execute the seeds script that populates the database with test data. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` mix run priv/repo/seeds.exs ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Email Verification in Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: Configuration option to enable email verification in Plausible Analytics, which is disabled by default. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: Environment Variables CODE: ``` ENABLE_EMAIL_VERIFICATION=true ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring ClickHouse Buffer Settings in Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: Configuration parameters added to control ClickHouse buffer flushing interval and maximum buffer size in Plausible Analytics. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Environment Variables CODE: ``` CLICKHOUSE_FLUSH_INTERVAL_MS= CLICKHOUSE_MAX_BUFFER_SIZE= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Test Pageview Data DESCRIPTION: Command to send a fake pageview event for testing purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` mix send_pageview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Stopping Docker Containers DESCRIPTION: Commands to stop and remove the Postgres and Clickhouse containers. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` make postgres-stop make clickhouse-stop ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running k6s Load Test for Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: This command executes the k6s load test script located at test/load/script.js. It assumes that a local server is running and ready to be tested. The script likely contains specific test scenarios and parameters for load testing Plausible Analytics. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/test/load/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` $ k6 run test/load/script.js ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Web Crawler Access in robots.txt DESCRIPTION: A simple robots.txt configuration that instructs all web crawlers and search engine bots not to index or crawl any part of the website. The wildcard user-agent (*) targets all bots, and the root path disallow (/) prevents access to the entire site. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/priv/static/robots.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: robots.txt CODE: ``` User-agent: * Disallow: / ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Pre-commit Hooks DESCRIPTION: Command to uninstall pre-commit hooks if they become too bothersome. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` pre-commit uninstall ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Describing UAInspector Parser Databases in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This markdown snippet explains the source of the UAInspector Parser Databases files and provides a reference to the original project for license information. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/priv/ua_inspector/ua_inspector.readme.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # UAInspector Parser Databases The files in this directory are taken from the [matomo-org/device-detector](https://github.com/matomo-org/device-detector) project. See there for detailed license information about the data contained. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Base URL in Plausible Analytics DESCRIPTION: Replacement of HOST and SCHEME parameters with a single BASE_URL parameter in Plausible Analytics. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: Environment Variables CODE: ``` BASE_URL= ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding an Image in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to embed an image in a Markdown file using the standard Markdown syntax for images. It displays a screenshot of the Plausible Analytics dashboard. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ![Plausible Analytics](https://plausible.io/docs/img/plausible-analytics.png) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Centered Navigation Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a centered navigation menu using HTML within a Markdown file. It includes links to various sections of the Plausible Analytics website. SOURCE: https://github.com/plausible/analytics/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ```

Simple Metrics | Lightweight Script | Privacy Focused | Open Source | Docs | Contributing
